price: 他们确信幽玄，谨守拜功，并分舍我所给予他们的。
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yu'minūna bil-ghaybi wayuqīmūna al-ṣalata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
